alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 10:24AM CST until December 18 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Monticello. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Water inundates some lowland and agricultural land near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and will continue falling. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Monticello 22.0 22.2 Sat 8 am CST 19.9 19.0 18.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday evening.
